description:
In this course we will be looking at the fundamental slides and contents that need to be included in a pitch deck to impress investors with your research about your startup. Investors smell bullshit miles away, which is why it is important that your pitch deck is afortress of facts about your startup's plans and goals.

After completing this course you'll know anything a startup founder should know about pitching to investors, including doing market research, identifying problem for startups and how to pitch your solution for solving them, summarizing what makes your team and vision special and how to set yourself apart from your competition in your pitch deck.

Bonus videos include tips on how to improve your presentation skills in general.
title: Wow investors: The fundamentals of a killer pitch deck
